analysis.description:
mdbToken.refund (/unique_chucks/37/0x61ea46d23b5ead47be7dbb9d54d185dbd7137dc4.sol#582-608) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _addr.transfer(value) (/unique_chucks/37/0x61ea46d23b5ead47be7dbb9d54d185dbd7137dc4.sol#605-606)

mdbToken.destroy (/unique_chucks/37/0x61ea46d23b5ead47be7dbb9d54d185dbd7137dc4.sol#698-708) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(this.balance == 0)
